name: Cicada Jada
description:
WASD to move, left click to interact, Esc for menu.

  • Design, Writing, Music, Voice: Ashton Bitton
  • Concept: Mercedes Hesselroth
  • Programming: Tony Li

Made for the Brood X Jam. Examine the life of the player's grandmother through the 17-year emergences of the Brood X population of cicadas.
